message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. It's a fantastic deal, considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,100,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,125,000. This is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to you.  Let's see if we can close this deal!

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,125,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,075,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
